name: Zork Remake
description:
This is my total take of Infocom's (Activition's) text adventure game of Zork, it will be like the original but with a twist.

This Game is made with Inform 7 - an interactive fiction program for many platforms it will be released on.

This game has silly puns to silly humor so if you like to have one adventure of the great underground empire then play my remake of Zork and have a grand adventure with the silly puns and humor it will have.

You can look up this youtube video on coping the Amiga Disk Image to Real Floppy and watch any video on how to copy them to floppies using your drawbridge of choice.
